description: We are seeking a Senior Python Developer to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for developing scalable web applications using Python, Django, and Flask frameworks. Experience with cloud platforms like AWS and containerization technologies like Docker is highly preferred.
requirements: 5+ years Python experience, Django/Flask, AWS, Docker, REST APIs, PostgreSQL, Git

description: Join our data science team to build machine learning models and extract insights from large datasets. You'll work with Python, R, SQL, and various ML frameworks to solve complex business problems and drive data-driven decision making.
requirements: PhD/MS in Data Science, Python, R, SQL, Machine Learning, TensorFlow/PyTorch, Statistics, Pandas, NumPy

description: We're looking for a Full Stack JavaScript Developer to work on modern web applications. You'll be working with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB to create responsive and scalable applications for our clients.
requirements: 3+ years JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, HTML5, CSS3, Git, RESTful APIs

description: Seeking a DevOps Engineer to manage our cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines. You'll work with AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, and CI/CD tools to ensure smooth application deployment and monitoring.
requirements: AWS/Azure, Kubernetes, Docker, Jenkins/GitLab CI, Linux, Python/Bash scripting, Terraform, Monitoring tools

description: Join our ML team to deploy machine learning models into production. You'll work on model optimization, A/B testing, and building ML pipelines using Python, TensorFlow, and cloud platforms.
requirements: MS in CS/ML, Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch, MLOps, AWS/GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, SQL, Statistics

description: We need a talented Frontend Developer specializing in React to create beautiful and intuitive user interfaces. You'll collaborate with designers and backend developers to deliver exceptional user experiences.
requirements: 3+ years React, JavaScript ES6+, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Webpack, Git, RESTful APIs, Responsive Design

description: Looking for a Backend Java Developer to work on enterprise-level applications. You'll be developing microservices using Spring Boot, working with databases, and ensuring high performance and scalability.
requirements: 5+ years Java, Spring Boot, Microservices, SQL, REST APIs, Maven/Gradle, JUnit, Git, Docker

description: Seeking an experienced Cloud Architect to design and implement cloud solutions for our clients. You'll work with AWS, Azure, and GCP to create scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud architectures.
requirements: 7+ years cloud experience, AWS/Azure/GCP certifications, Terraform, Kubernetes, Security best practices, Architecture design

description: Join our QA team to develop and maintain automated testing frameworks. You'll create test scripts, perform API testing, and ensure quality across web and mobile applications using various testing tools.
requirements: Selenium WebDriver, Python/Java, API testing, Postman, TestNG/JUnit, CI/CD, Git, Test automation frameworks

description: We're seeking a Technical Product Manager to lead product development and strategy. You'll work closely with engineering teams, analyze user data, and drive product roadmap decisions in a fast-paced startup environment.
requirements: 5+ years product management, Technical background, Agile/Scrum, Data analysis, User research, Roadmap planning, Stakeholder management
